dict.string:
Calcium. We all know that
milk contains calcium and
drinking milk will make you
tall. That is true. However,

There is a sodium-calcium
exchanger membrane in your
cells. It can remove calcium
from cells with sodium.
This means eating sodium,
which is anything salty,
will make the calcium go away.

No matter how much milk
you drink or calcium supplement
you take, if you eat salty things,
that calcium will not be effective.

Eating tips of the day:
Know that what you know about
nutrition can be true, and
you will, still, not be able
to benefit from it without the
knowledge of the whole story
